items.name: shiny stone
items.description: A smooth, grey stone that catches the light in an interesting way.

items.name: old map
items.description: A brittle piece of parchment with crude drawings. It seems to depict a series of caves.

rooms.name: Forest Clearing
rooms.description: You are in a small clearing surrounded by tall trees. Sunlight dapples through the leaves. To the east, you see the dark mouth of a cave.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: You stand at the entrance of a dark, damp cave. A chill wind blows from within. The clearing is back to the west, and a narrow tunnel leads north.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: It's much darker here in this narrow tunnel. Water drips steadily from the ceiling. You can barely make out the cave entrance to the south. Something lies on the ground here.
